name: Endurance
description: ~The art of following your dreams through thick and thin. 100% Silk 100% Traditional Rayon Kente Includes Silk tassles Size 40cm x 170cm The “Endurance” scarf has a blue and pink Kente weave on one side and blue patterned silk fabric on the reverse. Dry clean only. Colours and sizes may vary slightly as all items are handcrafted. WE SHIP OVERSEAS

name: Fearless
description: ~ Don’t let any of life’s hurdles prevent you from pursuing your goals. Barriers are strategically placed to test your power and determination to succeed. The “Fearless” scarf has the Ghanaian symbol “Gye Nyame” (Supremacy of God) hand-embroided at both ends of the scarf. Orange silk brocade on one side & fushia pink lining on the reverse. 100% Silk brocade Includes silk tassles. Size: 31cm x 187cm Dry clean only. Colours and sizes may vary slightly as all items are handcrafted. WE SHIP OVERSEAS

name: Creative
description: ~Everyone has a playful spirit in them. It is up to you to unravel your creativeness and learn to use it to your advantage. 100% Silk brocade 100% Traditional rayon Kente Includes silk tassles. Size 29cm x 190cm The “Creative” scarf has a blue & cream Kente weave set within the blue patterned silk fabric. Dry clean only. Colours and sizes may vary slightly as all items are handcrafted. WE SHIP OVERSEAS

name: Independent
description: ~Don’t depend on others for your own happiness. It lies within you and your actions. 100% Silk brocade 100% Gold threading 100% Traditional rayon Kente Includes silk tassles. Size 30×193cm The “Independent” scarf has gold green silk Brocade and blue lining on the reverse. The multicoloured Kente is visible on both sides. The beauty of this scarf is that it is woven with pure GOLD thread creating a rich shine. Dry clean only. Colours and sizes may vary slightly as all items are handcrafted. WE SHIP OVERSEAS

name: Charisma
description: ~ Use the abilty to influence with your gentle personality. 100% Silk 100% Traditional rayon Kente Includes silk tassles. Size 57×185cm The “Charisma” scarf incorporates Indian silk, Ghanaian Kente and the symbol “Adinkrahene” (Charisma, Leadership and Greatness). Within the black silk are discreet paisely patterns. Dry clean only. Colours and sizes may vary slightly as all items are handcrafted. WE SHIP OVERSEAS
